thought: Slack API requires the message text to be passed as the 'text' parameter in params, but currently only 'select', 'channelId', and 'messageType' are set. I need to include the 'text' field in the params using n8n expression to map the input item's 'json.text'.
plan: Add 'text' parameter in Slack action params with expression '={{$json["text"]}}'
Test Slack message sending to ensure messages are delivered with correct content
criticism: Slack messages are not sent because the 'text' parameter is missing in the Slack action params, which is required to send the actual message content.

tool_input.comments: Send classified 'to Business' commercial entries to Slack channel #general with message text from input data.
